data.name: Accuracy Indicator
data.value: Adds a more exact accuracy indicator on the bottom of the screen. Also displays average accuracy in milliseconds at the end of the level.

data.name: AccuracyDisplay
data.value: A live accuracy display for your viewing pleasure.

data.name: Alt Tab Mute
data.value: Mutes the game when it's not focused.

data.name: AlwaysBadApple
data.value: A mod which changes the background and character etc into black and white in tohou scene

data.name: BestCombinationSuggest
data.value: Displays the best character combination for a level in the pause screen The character combo displayed is usually correct, but don't put your blind faith in it When in doubt, refer to CharacterScoreboard

data.name: BPMDisplay
data.value: A mod which displays the BPM info above level designer on preparation screen

data.name: CharacterRandomizer
data.value: Everytime you play a chart, a random character combination will be selected

data.name: ChartDeleter
data.value: Allows you to queue custom charts to be deleted or moved when you exit the game.

data.name: ChartReview
data.value: Automatically selects sleepwalker, sets offset to 0, sets fever to manual, disables certain UI elements. Can be toggled on/off while in-game

data.name: ChineseMode
data.value: Censores certain aspects of the game (Characters, illustrations, etc)

data.name: Cinema
data.value: The mod that allows you to see video backgrounds in custom charts

data.name: CustomAlbums
data.value: The mod that allows you to load in custom charts

data.name: CustomAnchorSupport
data.value: Allows you to use add the streamer tag in your info.json to mark a song as copyright-free (for use with streamer mode)

data.name: CustomBGBrightness
data.value: Allows you to adjust background brightness lower than 40%

data.name: CustomLoadingScreens
data.value: Allows you to add custom loading screens (CustomLoadingScreens folder) Also allows you to add custom loading screen messages (UserData/CustomLoadingScreens.cfg) Messages can be paired with an image, or be left as random

data.name: CustomResolution
data.value: Adds a Custom option in resolution settings, which can be changed in the config

data.name: EffectDisable
data.value: Disables some in-game effects

data.name: FavGirl
data.value: Allows you to favorite characters and elfins This will make you look like that character even if another character is selected. You will have the abilities of the selected character & your plays will be submitted as such

data.name: FC AP indicator
data.value: Tells you whether you're on All Perfect/Full Combo pace, and displays the number of misses/greats

data.name: FeverEffectDisable
data.value: Disables the fever background effect

data.name: Headquarters
data.value: Allows you to submit scores on custom charts obtained from the MDMC website

data.name: HiddenQoL
data.value: Adds a button to always show hidden difficulties. E.g. you don't need to spam click and such to unlock them before playing

data.name: KeybindManager
data.value: A library for other mods to parse and listen to keybinds

data.name: LocalizeLib
data.value: A library for other mods to localize text

data.name: MDRPC
data.value: Muse Dash Rich Presence, which is exactly what it says it is.

data.name: ModManager
data.value: Allows you to disable & delete mods while in-game.

data.name: Muse Dash Mirror
data.value: A library that makes it easier to access PlayerData, BattleComponents info and create UI elements. This mod does nothing by itself.

data.name: MuseDashModTools
data.value: Automatically detects and logs available mod updates.

data.name: NoAutoPause
data.value: Prevents the game from automatically pausing when the game loses focus.

data.name: NoLevelUpAnimations
data.value: Level up animations take ages; Let's skip them.

data.name: PerfectDisable
data.value: Allows you to disable the judgements in-game. (example: show early/late perfects but not pure perfects) Inspired by ADOFAI Tweaks

data.name: PopupLib
data.value: A library for other mods to manage popups and windows

data.name: PreventLowAcc
data.value: A mod that that allows let's you prevent a score from uploading, and still be able to take a screenshot.

data.name: QuickRestart
data.value: Allows you to use Delete to instantly leave a chart & Allows you to use Backspace to instantly restart a chart Update now allows you to set custom keybinds.

data.name: QuickSwitchCombination
data.value: Allows you to set keybinds to quickly change your characters. Now has an in-game menu to add keybinds

data.name: SceneEggs
data.value: Makes it possible for customs to use certain background decorations that the default charts use.

data.name: Scoreboard characters and elfins
data.value: Similar to CharacterScoreboard, however, it instead adds icon clickable icon representations, which automatically switches to the character combo when clicked.

data.name: ScrollSpeed
data.value: Allows charters (not players) to set custom scroll speeds. It's completely up to you whether you wanna use this, most charters don't use it though.

data.name: StricterJudge
data.value: A mod which changes the judgement window and make the game harder You can manually change the judgement range in Stricter Judge.cfg

data.name: True rank for 999+
data.value: Displays actual ranking instead of "999+" for ranks 1000 to 2000

data.name: UI Disable
data.value: Allows you to disable certain visual aspects of the game (example: hit circles)

data.name: UltraInstinctSleepwalking
data.value: Makes Sleepwalker Rin do mashers at max speed instead of the normal slow speed.

data.name: UnlockAll2
data.value: An alternative to UnlockAll. Master's stay unlocked only for as long as the mod is installed.

data.name: VictoryScreenSwitcher
data.value: Allows you to switch victory screen in the settings menu either to DJMAX or Arknights. Swaps original screen with arknights/djmax and vise versa.
